text:
After Janhvi Kapoor and Ishaan Khatter, Saif Ali Khan’s daughter Sara Ali Khan is all set to make her Bollywood debut. While her movie with Sushant Singh Rajput titled Kedarnath is all set for the release on Dec 7, she is also doing a film with Ranveer Singh.
As the days of her big Bollywood debut are nearing, she is making waves in the industry. The cast is on a promotion spree. She will also be seen sharing the Koffee couch with Saif Ali Khan for Karan Johar’s chat show. Looks like it’s going to be fun banter between the three.
What’s more? She recently danced on her daddy Saif Ali Khan’s iconic track Ole Ole, but couldn’t get the step right. It's only when Sushant Singh Rajput taught her she managed to ace it and how. Take a look!
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 263 SHARES 707 SHARES 416 SHARES
Meanwhile, enjoy the old yet gold track in the video below.
title: After Several Tries & Sushant's Help, Sara Ali Khan Finally Aces Dad Saif's Iconic Ole Ole Step
description: After Janhvi Kapoor and Ishaan Khatter, Saif Ali Khan’s daughter Sara Ali Khan is all set to make her Bollywood debut. While her movie with Sushant Singh Rajput titled Kedarnath is all set for the release on Dec 7, she is also doing a film with Ranveer Singh. She recently danced on her daddy Saif Ali Khan’s iconic track Ole Ole, but apparently she couldn’t get the step right. Sushant Singh Rajput
